subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|忄}} (when used as a left Chinese radical)
* {{l|mul|㣺}} (sometimes when used as a bottom Chinese radical, like [[慕]])

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: When written as a bottom radical, it is similar to [[灬]] but is distinguished by the second stroke from the left being longer, passing ''under'' the third stroke – this is an important composition detail.

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a heart, now highly stylized.
